name: Xenture
description: We appreciate you taking the time to check out our game. We understand it has its flaws but our team is very proud of what we were able to create in the time span given. We are a team of 7 students from the University of Utah, who created this game for a class project over the course of 13 weeks of summer. We learned a lot from the creation of this game and really hope you enjoy playing it!
